content: Which 'Piano Man' released an album in 1973 that has since become one of the best-selling albums in the US?

I believe you're referring to Billy Joel, who is famously known as the "Piano Man." In 1973, he released his album "Piano Man," which indeed has become one of the best-selling albums in the United States. This album showcased his talent for combining rock, pop, and classical music with his signature piano playing and songwriting skills. It includes some of his most beloved songs, such as the title track "Piano Man," "James," and "Say Goodbye to Hollywood." The success of this album helped establish Billy Joel as a prominent figure in the music industry and solidified his reputation as a talented musician and songwriter.
